dt-api.name: columns().visible()
dt-api.summary: Change the visibility of the selected columns.

type.description: Set the visibility of the selected columns.
type.parameter: Specify if the columns should be visible (`true`) or not (`false`).
type.returns: DataTables API instance with selected columns in the result set.

dt-api.description: Showing and hiding columns in a DataTable can be quite handy, particularly when showing tables with a large information density. This method allows the visibility of columns to be changed on-the-fly.

example.title: Hide all columns with a class of '.detail'
